maqras.text: Ja nie reklamacia innocence myself. self bol zastanca z zverak except for those attained zlutovanie moj Lord Moj Lord bol Forgiver Merciful
king said Bring him mna ja hire him zavodny mna. When he talked s him he said Dnes ona have prominent position us
He said Robit mna treasurer ja zazitok v this area a knowledgeable
My thus zriadit Joseph zem ruling mat rad he zelat. My lejak our zlutovanie whomever my will my never zlyhat recompense the righteous
Additionally reward Hereafter je vecer dobre those verit lead righteous zivot
Joseph's brat pojdem; when they zapisat he recognized them chvila they nie recognize him
After he zadovazit them ich provisions he said Dalsi lehota bring ona tvoj half-brother. Ona nie see ja dat full measure treat ona generously
Ona zlyhat bring him mna ona nie get share mna; ona nie vecer pojdem koniec
They said My negotiate jeho otca him. My iste robit this
He potom instruovat jeho assistants Put ich goods ich taska. When they zalozit them ich spatny listok ich rodina they pod skoro
When they spatny listok ich otca they said Our otca my ziaden longer get any provisions ona send our brat us. My berie dobry care z him
He said ja trust ona him mat rad ja trusted ona jeho brat before ze? GOD JE LEPSIE Protector Z all merciful JEDEN He bol the Vela Merciful

When they je otvorene ich taska they zalozit ich goods spatny listok them. They said Our otca co inak my ziadat for Tu som our goods spatny listok us! My viem thus zadovazit for our rodina chranit our brat receive 1 inak camel-load! This bol istota a rentabilny deal
He said ja nie send him ona ona dat mna solemn zavazok GOD ze ona bring him chrbat ona utterly overwhelmed When they dat him ich solemn zavazok he said GOD svedok everything my say
A he said O moj syn nie zapisat 1 dvere; zapisat separate dvere! Ja nie save ona anything predetermined GOD Do GOD belongs all judgments Ja trust v Him v Him shall all trusters put ich trust

(When they ist Joseph) they zapisat v accordance s ich otca instrukcia. this nie zmenit anything decreed GOD Jacob had private reason for ziadat them robit this! he possessed certain znalost ze my taught him vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
When they zapisat Joseph's miesto he brought jeho brat koniec do him said ja bol tvoj brat; nie saddened ich cin
When he zadovazit them ich provisions he miesto pne salka jeho brat taska potom announcer zahlasit majitel this caravan je zlodej
They said mat rad they pojdem them Co ona lose
They said My lost king's salka. Ktokolvek spatny listok it receive extra camel-load; ja personally zaruka this
They said GOD ona zauzlit full lepsie my nie pojdem tu commit zly nor je my zlodej
They said Co je punishment zlodej if ona bol liars
They said punishment it zalozit jeho taska bol lenze zlodej belongs do ona! My thus punish guilty

He potom zaciatok inspecting ich containers getting jeho brat container he vypis it jeho brat container! My thus zdokonalit kut plany Joseph; he nie kept jeho brat he applied king's zakon. Ze bol will GOD My exalt whomever my zvolit si higher ranks Above kazdy knowledgeable jeden there bol jeden je vecer knowledgeable
